title: First observation of electrode-correlated protonic conductivity of perovskite-type electrolytes and way towards optimization
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,4115-4125
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00688G, Paper
Zhixin Luo, Jiayi Tang, Zehua Wang, Guangming Yang, Tianjiu Zhu, Zezhou Lin, San Ping Jiang, Zongping Shao
Comparing symmetric cells with oxygen-ion and protonic conductive electrolytes, using distinct electrodes, shows that electrode hydration strongly affects proton-conductivity in defective perovskite electrolytes.
